title: Enchanting Neelam Nakshatra Haaram - A Symphony of Sapphire and Diamonds
materials: Crafted in 18 Karat Yellow Gold with a Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with vibrant Neelam (Sapphire) gemstones of excellent clarity and a brilliant cut
MQ-cut Diamonds. Sapphires weigh approximately 3.84 carats
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a modern take on a classic design. The necklace features a series of meticulously arranged sapphire cabochons, each surrounded by a halo of shimmering diamonds crafted in a flower shaped design. Three cascading diamond-encrusted pendants with captivating sapphire drops create a focal point. This adds a touch of traditional elegance.
colors: Primarily a cool-toned palette featuring the deep blue of the sapphires against the brilliance of the white diamonds and the warm glow of the yellow gold.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Adds a touch of regal charm to any outfit.
description: This haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design principles with a modern aesthetic. The high-quality sapphires and diamonds, combined with the expert craftsmanship of our artisans, ensure a piece that is not only beautiful but also a lasting investment. It's a testament to timeless elegance and a symbol of prosperity.
